list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refactor city data loading and command-line interface: update city data loading messages for clarity, simplify argument parsing, and remove unused options.

task.summary: Refactor city data handling: rename functions and add command-line interface for TSP
Refine visualization for Moroccan cities: enhance plot aesthetics and adjust transparency settings
Enhance city data handling and visualization: return city count, add nearest neighbor tour initialization, and improve plot aesthetics
Implement tabu search optimization for TSP: add command-line arguments, integrate optimization logic, and enhance visualization with optimized tour details
Enhance visualization for TSP: add special styling for edges from the starting city and maintain consistent styling for other edges
Enhance performance tracking visualization: improve plot layout, update performance metrics display, and refine stats presentation
Enhance command-line interface for TSP: add interactive tour selection, allow user to choose starting city and additional cities, and update nearest neighbor tour generation
Refactor command-line interface for TSP: remove unused options, streamline city selection process, and enhance performance tracking display
Refactor command-line interface for TSP: remove unused visualization options, streamline city and tour selection processes, and enhance performance tracking integration

Refactor city data loading and performance tracking: consolidate city data loading into a single function, enhance performance tracker to include starting city and visited cities information, and update related function calls.
Refactor city data handling and command-line interface: streamline city data loading, enhance performance tracking with starting city and visited cities, and simplify command-line argument parsing.
Fix capitalization in TSP title and update visualization title for consistency
Refactor city data loading and command-line interface: update city data loading messages for clarity, simplify argument parsing, and remove unused options.
